âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Bundles ES Modules, CommonJS, and AMD modules â€¢ Creates single or multiple asynchronously loaded chunks â€¢ Resolves dependencies during compilation â€¢ Uses loaders to preprocess files (e.g., TypeScript to JavaScript, images to Base64) â€¢ Highly modular plugin system
ðŸ“– Summary: Webpack is a module bundler primarily used for bundling JavaScript files for browsers. It supports various module types and offers features like code splitting for improved performance and a plugin system for extensibility. Webpack also handles preprocessing of various assets.
